description.part1: I am a software engineer with experience in backend, DevOps, frontend, and the development of mobile and web applications. I have worked on projects involving computer vision, IoT, ERP, and cloud architectures. I have experience in projects both in Brazil and abroad. On the backend, I have developed solutions for system integration and infrastructure creation, both on-premises and in the cloud (AWS). On the frontend, I have worked on web, mobile, and embedded applications, aiming to deliver clear and functional interfaces.
description.part2: I have participated in B2B and B2C projects, dealing with API integration, implementing CI/CD pipelines, and process optimization. I enjoy working in multidisciplinary teams and strive to use the right technologies to solve each project's challenges.
description.part3: I am motivated by challenges involving technological innovation, system architecture, and real business impact.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: Here are some of the projects I have worked on. Click on the project title to view more details.

sigiloMobile.title: Sigilo Mobile
sigiloMobile.description: A fast, cross-platform mobile application built with Flutter and Clean Architecture (BLoC). It leverages caching for performance and provides gas station managers with critical business information, helping them make better decisions.

kindraTrack.title: Kindra Track
kindraTrack.description: Kindra Track is an innovative web platform that enables complete monitoring of animal shipments such as pigs, fish, cattle, and chickens. Integrated with an embedded computer vision and sensor system, the platform receives real-time shipment information directly from farms.
kindraTrack.description2: In addition, Kindra Track features a mobile app that synchronizes this data, allowing managers to:
kindraTrack.description3: 1. Track the status of shipments and animals at their facilities.
kindraTrack.description4: 2. Receive automatic notifications of count discrepancies, ensuring accuracy in logistics processes.
kindraTrack.description5: 3. Obtain detailed weekly reports with analyses of shipments that showed discrepancies compared to the values reported in the GTA (Animal Transfer Guide), providing greater transparency and operational control.

ww4.title: WW 4.0
ww4.description: WOOD WORK 4.0 is an internal web platform developed to enable complete digitalization and intelligent tracking of factory processes within the carpentry and furniture production sector. The project is a collaboration between NKA – New Knowledge Advice, Instituto Politécnico de Bragança (IPB), and CeDRI – Centro de Investigação em Digitalização e Robótica Inteligente. The platform replaces traditional paper-based workflows with a centralized digital application, streamlining daily operations on the factory floor. It integrates data analysis and computer vision to automate the capture, classification, and management of production data.

vamo.title: Vamo.com.vc
vamo.description: Vamo.com.vc is a modern flight booking platform that integrates with multiple airline APIs to deliver real-time results, uses parallel searches for faster responses, tracks user data with Google Analytics, and applies smart caching to improve performance, all within an intuitive, mobile-friendly design for a seamless booking experience.

weed.title: Weed Vision
weed.description: Weed Vision is a Selective Spraying system that uses computer vision to apply herbicides only on target plants, reducing field contamination by up to 80% and minimizing herbicide and fertilizer waste. This creates both a positive environmental impact and significant financial savings, forming a mutualistic synergy between agriculture and the environment.
